QuestData.Title: The Irontide Crew
QuestData.Description:
You see those salty looking guys in red? That's the Irontide crew.
They're the worst of the worst. Cutthroats and brigands, to a man.
Irontide wouldn't be guarding the docks if they didn't stand to gain something...
Lighten their pockets. See what kinda hardware they've got.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Azerite Cutlasses and $2oa Horns of Azerite Powder from Irontide Cutthroats and Irontide Trickshots.
QuestData.RewardText: Just as I thought - Irontide cut some kind of deal with Ashvane.$B$BFigures... birds of a feather and all that.
